CaseArticle.name: CaseArticle
CaseArticle.description: Represents the association between a Case and a KnowledgeArticle.

ArticleLanguage.description: The language of the article associated with the case.

ArticleVersionNumber.description: The number assigned to a version of an article. This field is available in API version 24.0 and later.

CaseId.description: ID of the Case associated with the KnowledgeArticle.

IsSharedByEmail.description: Indicates that the article has been shared with the customer through an email.

KnowledgeArticleId.description: ID of the KnowledgeArticle associated with the Case.
